user.title: Connect to OpenRouteService
user.description: Enter your OpenRouteService API key. Don't have one? Sign up at {signup_url}

error.invalid_auth: Invalid API key. Please check your key and try again.
error.cannot_connect: Unable to connect to OpenRouteService API. Please check your internet connection and try again.
error.unknown: Unexpected error occurred. Please try again.

abort.already_configured: This API key is already configured.
